# Introduction

## Training Objectives

> **Welcome to R Programming Ecosystem!!** ![](images/R_logo.svg.png){width="98"}

i.  Familiarization with R-Ecosystem

ii. Learn the typical processes involved in Extract, Transform & Loading (ETL) with R programming

iii. Able to apply new knowledge in actual ETL project

## Topics Covered

i.  Introduction to R

    -   R-Studio IDE

    -   Data type & structure

    -   Coding style guide

ii. Import & Export Data

    -   Excel, CSV

    -   Database

iii. Data Manipulation

     -   Introduction to [dplyr](https://dplyr.tidyverse.org/) package ![](images/dplyr_logo.png){width="72"}
     -   Data manipulation with dplyr
     -   Data aggregation (count, grouping, summarize, slice, etc.)
     -   Data reshaping
     -   Handling date

iv. Regular Expression (Regex)

    -   Introduction to [stringr](https://stringr.tidyverse.org/articles/regular-expressions.html) package ![](images/stringr_logo.png){width="68"}
    -   Regex operation with stringr
